abstract: Profile of New York Jets equipment manager Ed Skiba, pregame warm-up partner chosen by wide receiver Odell Beckham Jr for his lack of skill at throwing football, which allows Beckham to practice catching unconventional passes.
lead_paragraph: Ed Skiba, a 5-foot-5, 140-pound assistant equipment manager, is the Giants’ second most famous passer. That is because Odell Beckham Jr. likes to practice catching wayward passes before every Giants game.

headline.main: Giants Practice-Session Passer Who Can’t Throw Makes for a Can’t-Miss Show
headline.print_headline: Practice-Session Passer Who Can’t Throw Makes for a Can’t-Miss Show

snippet: Ed Skiba, a 5-foot-5, 140-pound assistant equipment manager, is the Giants’ second most famous passer. That is because Odell Beckham Jr. likes to practice catching wayward passes before every Giants game.
